description:
Dr. Bronner’s has been doing it right for decades. What’s "it" you ask? In this case, the answer is peppermint bar soap that won’t dry your skin and feels cool and tingly. Enjoy the soft, smooth lather on your body, face or hair.

  • Scented with organic peppermint oil to keep shower time feeling fresh
  • Biodegradable
  • Vegan
  • Comes in a post-consumer recycled wrapper
  • Made with organic and Fair Trade Certified ingredients
name: Dr. Bronner's Pure-Castile Peppermint Bar Soap 140g
